title: Grade 10–11 Mathematics Mixed Quiz – Financial Maths, Algebra & Trigonometry

questions.question: Calculate the simple interest earned on R2 000 invested at 5% p.a. for 3 years.
R1 500 is invested at 4% p.a. simple interest. How long will it take to earn R240 interest?
What is the compound interest earned on R4 000 at 6% p.a. compounded annually for 2 years?
R5 000 is invested at 8% p.a. compounded semi-annually. What is the accumulated amount after 2 years?
How much must be invested now at 7.5% p.a. compounded annually to have R10 000 in 5 years?
An investment grows from R8 000 to R11 248 in 4 years at compound interest compounded annually. What is the annual interest rate?
A loan of R15 000 is repaid with monthly payments over 3 years at 12% p.a. compounded monthly. What is the approximate monthly payment? (Use formula or approximation)
questions.explanation: Using annuity formula approximation or calculator: ≈ R498 per month

questions.question: Solve for x: 3x – 7 = 11
Solve the quadratic equation: x² – 5x + 6 = 0
Solve for x: 2x + 3 > 11
Solve the inequality: –3x + 4 ≤ 13
Solve simultaneous equations: 2x + y = 7 and x – y = 2
Factorise fully: 2x² – 8x + 6
Solve quadratic inequality: x² – 4x – 5 > 0
questions.explanation: Roots x=–1, x=5 → parabola opens up → outside roots

questions.question: The next number in the pattern 3, 7, 12, 18, … is
questions.explanation: Differences +4, +5, +6 → next +7 → 18+7=25? Wait — actually pattern is +4,+5,+6 → 18+7=25

questions.question: Solve literal equation for x: ax + b = cx + d
questions.explanation: ax – cx = d – b → x(a–c) = d–b

questions.question: In a right triangle, if opposite = 3 and hypotenuse = 5, sin θ = ?
What is cos 60°?
If sin θ = 0.6 and θ acute, what is cos θ?
Simplify: sin²θ + cos²θ
sin(180° – θ) = ?
questions.explanation: Reduction formula: sin(180° – θ) = sin θ

questions.question: Solve for θ in [0°; 360°]: sin θ = 0.5
Prove or simplify: tan θ = sin θ / cos θ
questions.explanation: This is the standard quotient identity

questions.question: Solve: 2 sin²θ – sin θ – 1 = 0 for θ ∈ [0°; 360°]
questions.explanation: Let u=sin θ → 2u² – u – 1=0 → u=1 or u=–½ → θ=90°, 270°, 210°, 330° but check valid → typically 30°/150° from factoring
